# file Copyright.txt or https://cmake.org/licensing for details.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20.5)

# We name the project and the target for the ExternalProject_Add() call
# to something that will highlight to the user what we are working on if
# something goes wrong and an error message is produced.

project(zlib-populate NONE)

# Pass through things we've already detected in the main project to avoid
# paying the cost of redetecting them again in ExternalProject_Add()
set(GIT_EXECUTABLE [==[/opt/homebrew/bin/git]==])
set(GIT_VERSION_STRING [==[2.42.0]==])
set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY _CMAKE_FindGit_GIT_EXECUTABLE_VERSION
  [==[/opt/homebrew/bin/git;2.42.0]==]
)


include(ExternalProject)
ExternalProject_Add(zlib-populate
                     "UPDATE_DISCONNECTED" "False" "GIT_REPOSITORY" "https://github.com/madler/zlib.git" "GIT_TAG" "04f42ceca40f73e2978b50e93806c2a18c1281fc"
                    SOURCE_DIR          "/Users/jd18380/Documents/TenSEAL/_deps/com_microsoft_seal-build/thirdparty/com_microsoft_seal-build/thirdparty/zlib-src"
                    BINARY_DIR          "/Users/jd18380/Documents/TenSEAL/_deps/com_microsoft_seal-build/thirdparty/com_microsoft_seal-build/thirdparty/zlib-build"
                    CONFIGURE_COMMAND   ""
                    BUILD_COMMAND       ""
                    INSTALL_COMMAND     ""
                    TEST_COMMAND        ""
                    USES_TERMINAL_DOWNLOAD  YES
                    USES_TERMINAL_UPDATE    YES
)
